आत्मा आत्मन्येबोपासितव्यः ।

ātmā ātmanyevopāsitavyaḥ |

The Self alone is to be worshipped in the Self
446569cf25ae:
# Passage

सांख्य बा प्राकृ तिक योगः ।

sāṃkhya vā prākṛtika yogaḥ |

Sāṃkhya or the yoga of nature (Prakṛti)
03cbaa3d3df3:
# Passage

प्रकृ तिस्तेमहत्तत्वं सम्बर्द्धयतुसर्ब्बदा ।

prakṛtistemahattatvaṃ samvarddhayatusarvvadā |

May Prakṛti (nature) always enhance the principle of Mahat (cosmic intelligence)
05f413815bf9:
# Passage

या देबी सर्ब्बभूतेषु शक्तिरूपेण संस्थिता

yā devī sarvvabhūteṣu śaktirūpeṇa saṃsthitā

The Goddess who abides in all beings in the form of Śakti (power)
c41e500c8ee3:
# Passage

जलं सूर्य्योमहीबह्णिः बायुराकाशमेबच ।
दीक्षितोब्राह्मणः सोमः इत्यष्टौ तनवः स्मृताः ।

jalaṃ sūryomahīvahniḥ vāyurākāśamevaca |
dīkṣitobrāhmaṇaḥ somaḥ ityaṣṭau tanavaḥ smṛtāḥ |

Water, sun, earth, fire, wind, ether, the initiated Brahmin, and Soma—these eight are remembered as (Śiva's) bodies
